organization.fullName: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

identificationModule.briefTitle: Endovascular treatmenT for Acute Ischemic Stroke in China (DETECT2-China)
identificationModule.officialTitle: enDovascular trEatmenT for acutE isChemic sTroke in China (DETECT2-China): a Prospective, National, Multi-center, Registry Study

responsibleParty.investigatorAffiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

leadSponsor.name: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This is a prospective real world registry study, aiming to explore the effectiveness and safety of endovascular treatment of acute ischemic stroke in a Chinese population.

interventions.name: endovascular treatment
interventions.description: all enrolled patients must receive endovascular treatment

primaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2
primaryOutcomes.description: the minimum and maximum values of modified Rankin Score are 0 and 6, respectively; higher score mean a worse outcome

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 1
secondaryOutcomes.description: the minimum and maximum values of modified Rankin Score are 0 and 6, respectively; higher score mean a worse outcome
the minimum and maximum values of modified Rankin Score are 0 and 6, respectively; higher score mean a worse outcome

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Changes in National Institute of Health stroke scale (NIHSS)
secondaryOutcomes.description: the minimum and maximum values of NIHSS are 0 and 24, respectively; higher NIHSS mean a worse outcome
sICH was defined as 4 or more increase in NIHSS caused by hemorrhage

otherOutcomes.description: neuroimaging included brain CT, MRI or digital subtraction angiography
biomarker included Matrix metalloproteinases, proinflammatory cytokines, and etc.

otherOutcomes.measure: dynamic changes of TCD data associated
otherOutcomes.description: transcranial Doppler (TCD) data including blood velocity and pulse index, which will be collected at some centers

otherOutcomes.measure: dynamic changes of cortical blood oxygen saturation by near infrared spectroscopy
otherOutcomes.description: The data will be collected at some centers

eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: acute ischemic stroke with large vessel oclussion
